entries.return_waypoint_description_3: Return to Irenez and let her know that the weapons deal has been foiled.
entries.return_waypoint_description_2: Return to Irenez and let her know Skazz is no longer a threat.
entries.return_waypoint_description_1: Return to Irenez with Tessa Wylden.
entries.waypoint_description_2: Kill the Black Sun assassin named Skazz.
entries.waypoint_description_3: Take out the Black Sun thugs before the Imperials arrive to sell weapons to them.
entries.npc_reset_3: If you change your mind and want to try and help later, you know where to find me.
entries.npc_reset_2: If you change your mind and want to try and help later, you know where to find me.
entries.npc_reset_1: If you change your mind and want to try and help later, you know where to find me.
entries.player_sorry_6: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_reset_6: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_sorry_5: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_reset_5: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_sorry_4: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_reset_4: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_3_3: You don't want me to attack a company of Imperial soldiers or something crazy do you?
entries.player_sorry_3: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_reset_3: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.npc_failure_3: You didn't stop the weapons deal? Whatever nefarious use they put those weapons to is on your head... not mine.
entries.npc_noloc_3: I should soon receive the exact coordinates for where the Black Sun is meeting their imperial suppliers. Come back and see me in a little while.
entries.npc_work_3: Have you stopped the Black Sun from purchasing those weapons yet?
entries.npc_reward_3: You're very talented. You should consider speaking with the Commander. He might be able to find a use for you.
entries.npc_backtowork_3: If you're going to do this, please leave straight away.
entries.npc_4_3: Not at the moment, no. I just need you to take out the group of Black Sun thugs awaiting their next shipment of weapons. Will you do it?
entries.npc_3_3: Getting nervous about angering the Black Sun?
entries.npc_2_3: You have courage. I need you to take out the Black Sun members who are waiting to purchase some weapons.  If the Imperials arrive and the Black Sun thugs aren't there, the deal will fall through.
entries.npc_1_3: You're not going to believe where one of those money trails led us. Black Sun has been buying weapons from the blasted Imperials. This next one may be a little tricky. Are you still willing to help?
entries.player_3_2: Who has he been hired to kill?
entries.player_sorry_2: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_reset_2: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.npc_breech_2: You should not interfere with me. Here's why.
entries.dontknowyou_2: I don't have any business with you.
entries.otherescort_2: I don't have any business with you.
entries.npc_failure_2: That assassin has got to be stopped. I guess I'll have to find another way.
entries.npc_noloc_2: I need a few moments to make some last minute preparations with CorSec. Can you come back in a few minutes?
entries.npc_work_2: Have you stopped that assassin yet? Time's running out.
entries.npc_reward_2: Good work. Corellia is in your debt.
entries.npc_backtowork_2: The sooner you leave the sooner you can stop him.
entries.npc_4_2: The head of CorSec, which is why it's extremely important he be stopped. Will you do it?
entries.npc_3_2: Then I'd better find someone else to handle this right away.
entries.npc_2_2: Good, because this can't wait. He's called Skazz and he's deadly, so don't take any chances with him. Find him and stop him cold.
entries.npc_1_2: That woman you brought us was a goldmine of information. One very immediate lead we got was the recent hiring of an assassin. I'd like you to try and stop him. Will you do it?
entries.player_3_1: What sort of help do you need?
entries.player_sorry_1: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_reset_1: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.npc_dropoff_1: You shouldn't interfere in Black Sun business. It's unhealthy.
entries.npc_takeme_1: I'm not armed! Don't hurt me!
entries.npc_breech_1: I think we may have a problem...
entries.dontknowyou_1: Why don't you go on about your business?
entries.otherescort_1: I'm not who you're looking for.
entries.npc_failure_1: You couldn't bring her in after all, eh? I guess we'll have to make another attempt later.
entries.npc_noloc_1: I should receive word as to where you can find Tessa shortly. Why don't you come back in a little while?
entries.npc_work_1: Have you arrested that Black Sun number cruncher yet?
entries.npc_reward_1: Good job. Come see me again if you want more work.
entries.npc_backtowork_1: Was there something else you had to say?
entries.npc_4_1: To start with, I need someone to capture one of the money people. There's one we've been tailing for that very purpose. How about it?
entries.npc_3_1: Just looking out for number one, eh? I see how it is.
entries.npc_2_1: Good. Bring me Tessa Wylden. She's an accountant for Black Sun and can tell us a lot about how their money flows. She'll have guards so do be careful.
entries.npc_1_1: I'm known as Irenez. I'm currently involved in fighting Black Sun. If you're interested in helping Corellia fight back against the criminals that try to plunder her I could certainly use your help. Interested?
entries.npc_reset: If you change your mind and want to try and help later, you know where to find me.
entries.cantwork: Finish your current job and then come se me about some work.
entries.next: You've performed your duties admirably. I don't have anything else for you right now, but feel free to speak with Garm Bel Iblis. I've cleared you.
